TopicTitle: Clips from BDArmory and some other mods

Articles.Content:
Hey! I'm new to this forum, so I'm not sure if "Special" includes videos. I looked around and it seems to be so, so I posted this as "special" due to the lack of "video". Please correct me if I'm wrong

Now, to the video!

Here's the list of mods I used in the video, and which I reccommend for such videos

BahaSP/BDynamics - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82341

BD Armory - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-BahamutoD-s-Armory-v0-4-0-Dev-Thread-%28-more-stuff%29-Jul-29

Burn Together - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75170

Skillful (For long-range or in-flight switching, not using any parts) - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64211-InfiniteDice-Skillful-Combat-Damage-Weapons-Mod

Kerbal Joint Reinforcment - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-24-2-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v2-4-3-7-25-14

Hyperedit (not used in the making of this video, but helpful for setting up bases far away in other videos) - http://www.kerbaltekaerospace.com/

Procedural Fairings (Not used, but good for ICBMs and such) - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-24-2-Procedural-Fairings-3-08-procedural-costs-Win64-decoupler-fix-%28July-26%29

Proc. Parts (Parts used for aircraft fuel tanks. Must-have!) - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70676-0-24-2WIP-Procedural-Parts-Parts-the-way-you-want-em

What should I improve on? What should I change? Feedback is welcome!

Cool I like the use of burn together, does it work with the guns?

I think more plane scenes would be cool, and during the day perhaps?

Thanks

Yes, if you activate the guns manually on all vechicles or using BT's AG mimic, they all fire at once even without burn together. Basically as long as the vechicle is controllable and has the gun active, it can fire if you click anywhere within it's range, even if you are switched to another vechicle.

I'll try to get some day shots too, but the only thing i am afraid of is that it won't look so war-like, as most war themed scenes are at night. But I'll try anyway, thanks I'll also try to get some A2A fighting, the only problem is that it's hard to hit without a lead marker but it's possible if you can steer the aircraft
